filmography.title: Teresa
filmography.role_description: A pivotal supporting role as a psychiatrist who helps a troubled WWII veteran; Steiger's film debut.
filmography.plot: A young Italian woman marries an American GI and moves to New York City, where she struggles with his domineering mother.

filmography.title: On the Waterfront
filmography.role_description: The corrupt, conflicted brother of Terry Malloy who shares the famous 'I coulda been a contender' scene.
filmography.plot: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

filmography.title: Oklahoma!
filmography.role_description: A menacing, brooding farmhand who becomes obsessed with Laurey in this classic Rodgers and Hammerstein musical.
filmography.plot: In the Oklahoma territory, a farm girl is courted by a cowboy and a menacing farmhand.

filmography.title: The Big Knife
filmography.role_description: A tyrannical, manipulative movie studio head based on Harry Cohn, who blackmails a star actor.
filmography.plot: A Hollywood actor wants to quit the business to save his marriage, but a studio boss blackmails him into staying.

filmography.title: The Court-Martial of Billy Mitchell
filmography.role_description: A sharp, intense military prosecutor who ruthlessly questions witnesses during the famous trial.
filmography.plot: General Billy Mitchell is court-martialed for accusing the War and Navy Departments of incompetence regarding air power.

filmography.title: Jubal
filmography.role_description: A jealous, hateful ranch hand who spreads lies to destroy a newcomer he despises.
filmography.plot: A Wyoming rancher's wife takes a liking to a new cowhand, sparking deadly jealousy from the ranch foreman.

filmography.title: The Harder They Fall
filmography.role_description: A crooked boxing promoter who fixes fights and exploits a gentle giant for profit; Bogart's final film.
filmography.plot: A down-on-his-luck sportswriter is hired by a shady promoter to hype a large but untalented boxer whose fights are fixed.

filmography.title: Run of the Arrow
filmography.role_description: A Confederate soldier who refuses to surrender after the Civil War and joins the Sioux nation to fight the Union.
filmography.plot: After the Civil War, a Confederate soldier joins the Sioux and passes their initiation test to become a warrior.

filmography.title: Across the Bridge
filmography.role_description: A fugitive German financier who assumes another man's identity in Mexico, only to find the man was a wanted killer.
filmography.plot: An embezzler on the run in Mexico switches identities with a man he believes is a fellow tourist, only to discover the man is a murderer.

filmography.title: Al Capone
filmography.role_description: A gritty, non-glamorized portrayal of the notorious Chicago gangster's rise and fall.
filmography.plot: A biography of the Chicago gangster Al Capone, tracing his rise to power and eventual imprisonment for tax evasion.
filmography.awards: Laurel Award: Win – Top Male Dramatic Performance

filmography.title: The Longest Day
filmography.role_description: A brief but memorable role as a naval commander in this sprawling ensemble epic about the D-Day landings.
filmography.plot: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

filmography.title: The Pawnbroker
filmography.role_description: A Jewish pawnbroker and Holocaust survivor in East Harlem who has shut off his emotions to survive his trauma.
filmography.plot: A Jewish pawnbroker, a victim of Nazi persecution, loses all faith in his fellow man until he realizes too late the tragedy of his actions.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; BAFTA: Win – Best Foreign Actor; Berlin: Win – Silver Bear

filmography.title: The Loved One
filmography.role_description: An effeminate, mother-obsessed chief embalmer at a high-end funeral home in this dark satire.
filmography.plot: A young British poet visits his uncle in Los Angeles and gets involved with the funeral business and a cosmetician.

filmography.title: Doctor Zhivago
filmography.role_description: A cynical, pragmatic opportunist who survives the Russian Revolution by shifting allegiances and manipulating those around him.
filmography.plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to an aristocrat, falls in love with a political activist's wife.

filmography.title: In the Heat of the Night
filmography.role_description: A bigoted small-town Mississippi police chief who learns to respect a black detective from Philadelphia while solving a murder.
filmography.plot: A black Philadelphia police detective is mistakenly suspected of a local murder while passing through a racially hostile Mississippi town.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Actor; BAFTA: Win – Best Foreign Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: No Way to Treat a Lady
filmography.role_description: A flamboyant theater owner and serial killer who uses various disguises to murder women and taunt the police.
filmography.plot: A serial killer who uses various disguises stalks women in New York City while taunting the detective on the case.

filmography.title: The Sergeant
filmography.role_description: A tough Army sergeant in post-war France who struggles with his repressed homosexuality and obsession with a subordinate.
filmography.plot: A master sergeant in post-WWII France becomes obsessed with a handsome young private.

filmography.title: The Illustrated Man
filmography.role_description: A wanderer whose skin is covered in tattoos that come to life and tell terrifying tales of the future.
filmography.plot: A young man encounters a mysterious wanderer whose tattoos predict the future and tell three strange stories.

filmography.title: Waterloo
filmography.role_description: The French Emperor who returns from exile to face the Duke of Wellington in one final, decisive battle.
filmography.plot: Facing the decline of everything he has worked to obtain, conqueror Napoleon Bonaparte and his army confront the British at the Battle of Waterloo.

filmography.title: Duck, You Sucker!
filmography.role_description: A Mexican bandit who unwillingly becomes a hero of the revolution after teaming up with an Irish explosives expert.
filmography.plot: An IRA explosives expert on the run in Mexico meets an amoral bandit, and together they are drawn into the Mexican Revolution.

filmography.title: W.C. Fields and Me
filmography.role_description: A biographical portrayal of the legendary comedian W.C. Fields, focusing on his rise to fame and personal relationships.
filmography.plot: The story of W.C. Fields, from his days in vaudeville to his success in Hollywood and his relationship with Carlotta Monti.

filmography.title: Jesus of Nazareth
filmography.role_description: The Roman prefect of Judaea who presides over the trial of Jesus, portrayed as a weary bureaucrat.
filmography.plot: A comprehensive miniseries detailing the life, teachings, death, and resurrection of Jesus Christ.

filmography.title: The Amityville Horror
filmography.role_description: A Catholic priest who tries to bless a haunted house but is driven away by supernatural forces and a lack of faith from his superiors.
filmography.plot: Newlyweds move into a large house where a mass murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.

filmography.title: Lion of the Desert
filmography.role_description: The Italian dictator who orders the brutal suppression of the Libyan resistance led by Omar Mukhtar.
filmography.plot: In 1929 Italy, Benito Mussolini appoints General Rodolfo Graziani to crush the Libyan resistance led by Omar Mukhtar.

filmography.title: The Chosen
filmography.role_description: A strict Hasidic rabbi in 1940s Brooklyn who raises his brilliant son in silence to teach him compassion.
filmography.plot: Two Jewish boys in Brooklyn, one Hasidic and one secular, form a friendship despite their fathers' opposing views on Zionism.
filmography.awards: Montreal World Film Festival: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Specialist
filmography.role_description: A powerful Cuban crime boss in Miami who becomes the target of a vengeful woman and an explosives expert.
filmography.plot: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.

filmography.title: Mars Attacks!
filmography.role_description: A hawkish, war-mongering general who urges the President to attack the invading Martians immediately.
filmography.plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.
